DOC.brief_summary: To assess the tolerability and safety of hOKT3g1 (Ala-Ala) after a 12-day dosing regimen administered via intravenous infusion. To assess the pharmacokinetics of hOKT3g1 (Ala-Ala).
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics (PK) of hOKT3g1 (Ala-Ala) in Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM)
DOC.criteria: To be eligible participants will have Type 1 diabetes, diagnosed within the previous 12 months and established by standard American Diabetes Association criteria. All participants will have autoantibodies: either antiGAD65, antiICA512, or if treated with insulin for less than 7 days, antiinsulin. The age range will be between 8 and 30 years; and a minimum weight of 34 kg.
